review: Love the product! Super easy set up!
author: Marina Munguia

review: Bought this Chromecast as a gift after using one myself for a year.  Out of all the TV sticks I've experienced (roku, apple tv, google tv) - Chromecast has, by far, been the easiest to use and had the most flexible options, not to mention that its also the least expensive option.  Can be controlled by any cell phone (both android and iphone) on the same wifi network - huge amount of compaible appls, online content, and there's applications that will stream your own media for a variety of local server types.
author: J. Lin

review: The chromecast is my favorite new TV gadget. I've been using mine for a while now, but I am considering purchasing another for my home office. I am constantly casting things to my TV like my podcasts, music, youtube videos. and I litterally never touch the Blueray player anymore because I can just buy the movie on google Play and cast it to my TV much easier.  It's not too often that a piece of tech comes along and changes the way you live your life, but this certainly has.
author: Ben

review: Works great. Wish they would make more apps compatible with it
author: Byron McCoy

review: I use this all the time and it works great, sometimes if the WiFi is bad it buffers, but very rarely. Unfortunately you can't play any music to a TV that isn't bought from the Google play store, which kinda blows, otherwise awesome gadget for a low price, I recommend!
